faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The course gives a basic understanding of the structures and chemical properties of biomolecules (amino acids, proteins, lipids, mono- and polysaccharides, nucleic acids). We give an introduction to enzymology and the most important metabolic pathways. The main attention is paid to the application of previously learned material (chemistry, biochemistry) in solving various problems and tasks.
description.et: Üldhariv kursus, mis käsitleb bioprotsessides toimuvaid keemilisi reaktsioone, hõlmates staatilist  biokeemiat (raku molekulaarsed komponendid), ensümoloogiat (biokeemiline katalüüs) . Põhitähelepanu pööratakse varem õpitud materjali (keemia, biokeemia) rakendamisele erinevate probleemide ja ülesannete lahendamisel.

objectives.en: Basic course about chemisrty of bioactive molecules and their metabolism. Using knowledge of organic chemistry,  students achieve understanding of chemical essence of several processes of nature. Previously learned knowledge of chemistry and biochemistry will be applied in solving different problems and tasks.
objectives.et: Biomolekulide keemia baasteadmiste kujundamine ning ülevaate andmine mõningatest nende metabolismi reaktsioonidest.. Lähtudes orgaanilise keemia baasteadmistest jõutakse mitmete looduses toimuvate protsesside keemilise mõistmiseni. Rakendatakse varem õpitud keemia ja biokeemia teadmisi vastavate probleemide ja ülesannete lahendamisel.

learning_outcomes.en:
-	Application of chemical principles in the understanding of biological processes
-	Problem-solving and analysis - finds opportunities to influence and plan biological/chemical processes
-	Knows the basic structures of biomolecules and is able to evaluate their chemical properties.
-	Knows classical methods of analysis of biopolymers.
-	Is able to apply the knowledge of chemistry in the description of reactions of metabolic pathways of biomolecules.
learning_outcomes.et:
Kursuse läbinu:
-	Rakendus - keemiliste põhimõtete rakendamine bioloogiliste protsesside mõistmisel
-	Ülesannete lahendamine ja analüüs- leiab võimalusi bioloogilisi/keemilisi protsesse mõjutada, planeerida
-	Teab põhilisi biomolekulide struktuure ja oskab hinnata nende keemilisi omadusi.
-	Teab biomolekulide keemia eripärasid ning orienteerub klassikalistes biopolümeride analüüsimeetodites.
-	Oskab rakendada orgaanilise keemia baaskursuse teadmisi biomolekulide metabolismiradades  toimuvate reaktsioonide kirjeldamisel.

oOn omandanud biomolekulide metabolismi põhimõisted ning omab ülevaadet tähtsamatest ainevahetusradadest.

description.et: Test. Results will be normalized and give 20 % of the final score
Test. Results will be normalized and give 20 % of the final score
Questions and exercises about all topics of the course. Gives 60% of the final mark, but 50% is required to pass.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials:
Materials from lecture
John L. Tymoczko, Jeremy M. Berg, Lubert Stryer	"Biochemistry: A Short Course" Second edition McMillan Higher Education, 2013
resources.recommended_materials:
D.L.Nelson, M.M.Cox "Lehninger Principles of Biochemistry" Fifthth edition Worth Publishers, 2009
J. E. McMurry, T.P. Begley "The Organic Chemistry of Biological Pathways" Roberts & Company Publishers 2005

description.et: Water, buffer solutions. pH and pK.
Chemical properties of amino acids and proteins. (Ch. 3, 4)
Work with proteins. Purification and modification (Ch. 40.)
Test. Buffer solutions, amino acids, peptides
Membranes and membrane transport. Signal transduction

audience.et: Students interested in chemical principles of biology and has obtained organic chemistry on level, allowing understand mechanisms of biochemical reactions.
